00035 #include <avr/io.h>

00042 /*
00043  *  constants and macros
00044  */
00045 
00046 /* size of RX/TX buffers */
00047 #define UART_RX_BUFFER_MASK ( UART_RX_BUFFER_SIZE - 1)
00048 #define UART_TX_BUFFER_MASK ( UART_TX_BUFFER_SIZE - 1)
00049 
00050 #if ( UART_RX_BUFFER_SIZE & UART_RX_BUFFER_MASK )
00051 #error RX buffer size is not a power of 2
00052 #endif
00053 #if ( UART_TX_BUFFER_SIZE & UART_TX_BUFFER_MASK )
00054 #error TX buffer size is not a power of 2
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 #if defined(__AVR_AT90S2313__) \
00058  || defined(__AVR_AT90S4414__) || defined(__AVR_AT90S4434__) \
00059  || defined(__AVR_AT90S8515__) || defined(__AVR_AT90S8535__) \
00060  || defined(__AVR_ATmega103__)
00061  /* old AVR classic or ATmega103 with one UART */
00062  #define AT90_UART
00063  #define UART0_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT   SIG_UART_RECV
00064  #define UART0_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT  SIG_UART_DATA
00065  #define UART0_STATUS   USR
00066  #define UART0_CONTROL  UCR
00067  #define UART0_DATA     UDR  
00068  #define UART0_UDRIE    UDRIE
00069 #elif defined(__AVR_AT90S2333__) || defined(__AVR_AT90S4433__)
00070  /* old AVR classic with one UART */
00071  #define AT90_UART
00072  #define UART0_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT   SIG_UART_RECV
00073  #define UART0_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT  SIG_UART_DATA
00074  #define UART0_STATUS   UCSRA
00075  #define UART0_CONTROL  UCSRB
00076  #define UART0_DATA     UDR 
00077  #define UART0_UDRIE    UDRIE
00078 #elif  defined(__AVR_ATmega8__)  || defined(__AVR_ATmega16__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega32__) \
00079   || defined(__AVR_ATmega8515__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega8535__) \
00080   || defined(__AVR_ATmega323__)
00081   /* ATmega with one USART */
00082  #define ATMEGA_USART
00083  #define UART0_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT   SIG_UART_RECV
00084  #define UART0_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT  SIG_UART_DATA
00085  #define UART0_STATUS   UCSRA
00086  #define UART0_CONTROL  UCSRB
00087  #define UART0_DATA     UDR
00088  #define UART0_UDRIE    UDRIE
00089 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega163__) 
00090   /* ATmega163 with one UART */
00091  #define ATMEGA_UART
00092  #define UART0_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT   SIG_UART_RECV
00093  #define UART0_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT  SIG_UART_DATA
00094  #define UART0_STATUS   UCSRA
00095  #define UART0_CONTROL  UCSRB
00096  #define UART0_DATA     UDR
00097  #define UART0_UDRIE    UDRIE
00098 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega162__)
00099  /* ATmega with two USART */
00100  #define ATMEGA_USART0
00101  #define ATMEGA_USART1
00102  #define UART0_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT   SIG_USART0_RECV
00103  #define UART1_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT   SIG_USART1_RECV
00104  #define UART0_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT  SIG_USART0_DATA
00105  #define UART1_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT  SIG_USART1_DATA
00106  #define UART0_STATUS   UCSR0A
00107  #define UART0_CONTROL  UCSR0B
00108  #define UART0_DATA     UDR0
00109  #define UART0_UDRIE    UDRIE0
00110  #define UART1_STATUS   UCSR1A
00111  #define UART1_CONTROL  UCSR1B
00112  #define UART1_DATA     UDR1
00113  #define UART1_UDRIE    UDRIE1
00114 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega64__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega128__) 
00115  /* ATmega with two USART */
00116  #define ATMEGA_USART0
00117  #define ATMEGA_USART1
00118  #define UART0_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT   SIG_UART0_RECV
00119  #define UART1_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT   SIG_UART1_RECV
00120  #define UART0_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT  SIG_UART0_DATA
00121  #define UART1_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT  SIG_UART1_DATA
00122  #define UART0_STATUS   UCSR0A
00123  #define UART0_CONTROL  UCSR0B
00124  #define UART0_DATA     UDR0
00125  #define UART0_UDRIE    UDRIE0
00126  #define UART1_STATUS   UCSR1A
00127  #define UART1_CONTROL  UCSR1B
00128  #define UART1_DATA     UDR1
00129  #define UART1_UDRIE    UDRIE1
00130 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega161__)
00131  /* ATmega with UART */
00132  #error "AVR ATmega161 currently not supported by this libaray !"
00133 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega169__) 
00134  /* ATmega with one USART */
00135  #define ATMEGA_USART
00136  #define UART0_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT   SIG_USART_RECV
00137  #define UART0_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT  SIG_USART_DATA
00138  #define UART0_STATUS   UCSRA
00139  #define UART0_CONTROL  UCSRB
00140  #define UART0_DATA     UDR
00141  #define UART0_UDRIE    UDRIE
00142 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega48__) ||defined(__AVR_ATmega88__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega168__)
00143  #define ATMEGA_USART0
00144  #define UART0_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT   SIG_USART_RECV
00145  #define UART0_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT  SIG_USART_DATA
00146  #define UART0_STATUS   UCSR0A
00147  #define UART0_CONTROL  UCSR0B
00148  #define UART0_DATA     UDR0
00149  #define UART0_UDRIE    UDRIE0
00150 #elif defined(__AVR_ATtiny2313__)
00151  #define ATMEGA_USART
00152  #define UART0_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT   SIG_USART0_RX 
00153  #define UART0_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT  SIG_USART0_UDRE
00154  #define UART0_STATUS   UCSRA
00155  #define UART0_CONTROL  UCSRB
00156  #define UART0_DATA     UDR
00157  #define UART0_UDRIE    UDRIE
00158 #else
00159  #error "no UART definition for MCU available"
00160 #endif

00163 /*
00164  *  module global variables
00165  */
00166 static volatile unsigned char UART_TxBuf[UART_TX_BUFFER_SIZE];
00167 static volatile unsigned char UART_RxBuf[UART_RX_BUFFER_SIZE];
00168 static volatile unsigned char UART_TxHead;
00169 static volatile unsigned char UART_TxTail;
00170 static volatile unsigned char UART_RxHead;
00171 static volatile unsigned char UART_RxTail;
00172 static volatile unsigned char UART_LastRxError;
00173 
00174 #if defined( ATMEGA_USART1 )
00175 static volatile unsigned char UART1_TxBuf[UART_TX_BUFFER_SIZE];
00176 static volatile unsigned char UART1_RxBuf[UART_RX_BUFFER_SIZE];
00177 static volatile unsigned char UART1_TxHead;
00178 static volatile unsigned char UART1_TxTail;
00179 static volatile unsigned char UART1_RxHead;
00180 static volatile unsigned char UART1_RxTail;
00181 static volatile unsigned char UART1_LastRxError;
00182 #endif

00185 
00186 SIGNAL(UART0_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT)
00187 /*************************************************************************
00188 Function: UART Receive Complete interrupt
00189 Purpose:  called when the UART has received a character
00190 **************************************************************************/
00191 {
00192     unsigned char tmphead;
00193     unsigned char data;
00194     unsigned char usr;
00195     unsigned char lastRxError;
00196  
00197  
00198     /* read UART status register and UART data register */ 
00199     usr  = UART0_STATUS;
00200     data = UART0_DATA;
00201     
00202     /* */
00203 #if defined( AT90_UART )
00204     lastRxError = (usr & (_BV(FE)|_BV(DOR)) );
00205 #elif defined( ATMEGA_USART )
00206     lastRxError = (usr & (_BV(FE)|_BV(DOR)) );
00207 #elif defined( ATMEGA_USART0 )
00208     lastRxError = (usr & (_BV(FE0)|_BV(DOR0)) );
00209 #elif defined ( ATMEGA_UART )
00210     lastRxError = (usr & (_BV(FE)|_BV(DOR)) );
00211 #endif
00212         
00213     /* calculate buffer index */ 
00214     tmphead = ( UART_RxHead + 1) & UART_RX_BUFFER_MASK;
00215     
00216     if ( tmphead == UART_RxTail ) {
00217         /* error: receive buffer overflow */
00218         lastRxError = UART_BUFFER_OVERFLOW >> 8;
00219     }else{
00220         /* store new index */
00221         UART_RxHead = tmphead;
00222         /* store received data in buffer */
00223         UART_RxBuf[tmphead] = data;
00224     }
00225     UART_LastRxError = lastRxError;   
00226 }
00227 
00228 
00229 SIGNAL(UART0_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT)
00230 /*************************************************************************
00231 Function: UART Data Register Empty interrupt
00232 Purpose:  called when the UART is ready to transmit the next byte
00233 **************************************************************************/
00234 {
00235     unsigned char tmptail;
00236 
00237     
00238     if ( UART_TxHead != UART_TxTail) {
00239         /* calculate and store new buffer index */
00240         tmptail = (UART_TxTail + 1) & UART_TX_BUFFER_MASK;
00241         UART_TxTail = tmptail;
00242         /* get one byte from buffer and write it to UART */
00243         UART0_DATA = UART_TxBuf[tmptail];  /* start transmission */
00244     }else{
00245         /* tx buffer empty, disable UDRE interrupt */
00246         UART0_CONTROL &= ~_BV(UART0_UDRIE);
00247     }
00248 }
00249 
00250 
00251 /** Initialize the UART-Interfaces of Scooter controller Board
00252  * */
00253 void init_uart( void )
00254 {
00255         /* set Txd of 1st Uart to output */
00256         DDRE = ( DDRD | (1<<PD3) );
00257         
00258         /* set Txd of 2nd Uart to output */
00259         DDRD = ( DDRD | 8 );
00260         
00261         /* Initialize first uart, set baudrate to 57600 with 16Mhz XTAL */
00262         uart_init( UART_BAUD_SELECT(57600, SYS_CLK ) );
00263         
00264         /* Initialize second uart, set baudrate to 57600 with 16Mhz XTAL */
00265         uart1_init( UART_BAUD_SELECT(57600, SYS_CLK ) );
00266         
00267         /* enable interrupts */
00268         sei();
00269 }
00270 
00271 
00272 /*************************************************************************
00273 Function: uart_init()
00274 Purpose:  initialize UART and set baudrate
00275 Input:    baudrate using macro UART_BAUD_SELECT()
00276 Returns:  none
00277 **************************************************************************/
00278 void uart_init(unsigned int baudrate)
00279 {
00280     UART_TxHead = 0;
00281     UART_TxTail = 0;
00282     UART_RxHead = 0;
00283     UART_RxTail = 0;
00284     
00285 #if defined( AT90_UART )
00286     /* set baud rate */
00287     UBRR = (unsigned char)baudrate; 
00288 
00289     /* enable UART receiver and transmmitter and receive complete interrupt */
00290     UART0_CONTROL = _BV(RXCIE)|_BV(RXEN)|_BV(TXEN);
00291 
00292 #elif defined (ATMEGA_USART)
00293     /* Set baud rate */
00294     if ( baudrate & 0x8000 )
00295     {
00296          UART0_STATUS = (1<<U2X);  //Enable 2x speed 
00297          baudrate &= ~0x8000;
00298     }
00299     UBRRH = (unsigned char)(baudrate>>8);
00300     UBRRL = (unsigned char) baudrate;
00301    
00302     /* Enable USART receiver and transmitter and receive complete interrupt */
00303     UART0_CONTROL = _BV(RXCIE)|(1<<RXEN)|(1<<TXEN);
00304     
00305     /* Set frame format: asynchronous, 8data, no parity, 1stop bit */
00306     #ifdef URSEL
00307     UCSRC = (1<<URSEL)|(3<<UCSZ0);
00308     #else
00309     UCSRC = (3<<UCSZ0);
00310     #endif 
00311     
00312 #elif defined (ATMEGA_USART0 )
00313     /* Set baud rate */
00314     if ( baudrate & 0x8000 ) 
00315     {
00316                 UART0_STATUS = (1<<U2X0);  //Enable 2x speed 
00317                 baudrate &= ~0x8000;
00318         }
00319     UBRR0H = (unsigned char)(baudrate>>8);
00320     UBRR0L = (unsigned char) baudrate;
00321 
00322     /* Enable USART receiver and transmitter and receive complete interrupt */
00323     UART0_CONTROL = _BV(RXCIE0)|(1<<RXEN0)|(1<<TXEN0);
00324     
00325     /* Set frame format: asynchronous, 8data, no parity, 1stop bit */
00326     #ifdef URSEL0
00327     UCSR0C = (1<<URSEL0)|(3<<UCSZ00);
00328     #else
00329     UCSR0C = (3<<UCSZ00);
00330     #endif 
00331 
00332 #elif defined ( ATMEGA_UART )
00333     /* set baud rate */
00334     if ( baudrate & 0x8000 ) 
00335     {
00336         UART0_STATUS = (1<<U2X);  //Enable 2x speed 
00337         baudrate &= ~0x8000;
00338     }
00339     UBRRHI = (unsigned char)(baudrate>>8);
00340     UBRR   = (unsigned char) baudrate;
00341 
00342     /* Enable UART receiver and transmitter and receive complete interrupt */
00343     UART0_CONTROL = _BV(RXCIE)|(1<<RXEN)|(1<<TXEN);
00344 
00345 #endif
00346 
00347 }/* uart_init */
00348 
00349 
00350 /*************************************************************************
00351 Function: uart_getc()
00352 Purpose:  return byte from ringbuffer  
00353 Returns:  lower byte:  received byte from ringbuffer
00354           higher byte: last receive error
00355 **************************************************************************/
00356 unsigned int uart_getc(void)
00357 {    
00358     unsigned char tmptail;
00359     unsigned char data;
00360 
00361 
00362     if ( UART_RxHead == UART_RxTail ) {
00363         return UART_NO_DATA;   /* no data available */
00364     }
00365     
00366     /* calculate /store buffer index */
00367     tmptail = (UART_RxTail + 1) & UART_RX_BUFFER_MASK;
00368     UART_RxTail = tmptail; 
00369     
00370     /* get data from receive buffer */
00371     data = UART_RxBuf[tmptail];
00372     
00373     return (UART_LastRxError << 8) + data;
00374 
00375 }/* uart_getc */
00376 
00377 
00378 /*************************************************************************
00379 Function: uart_putc()
00380 Purpose:  write byte to ringbuffer for transmitting via UART
00381 Input:    byte to be transmitted
00382 Returns:  none          
00383 **************************************************************************/
00384 void uart_putc(unsigned char data)
00385 {
00386     unsigned char tmphead;
00387 
00388     
00389     tmphead  = (UART_TxHead + 1) & UART_TX_BUFFER_MASK;
00390     
00391     while ( tmphead == UART_TxTail ){
00392         ;/* wait for free space in buffer */
00393     }
00394     
00395     UART_TxBuf[tmphead] = data;
00396     UART_TxHead = tmphead;
00397 
00398     /* enable UDRE interrupt */
00399     UART0_CONTROL    |= _BV(UART0_UDRIE);
00400 
00401 }/* uart_putc */
00402 
00403 
00404 /*************************************************************************
00405 Function: uart_puts()
00406 Purpose:  transmit string to UART
00407 Input:    string to be transmitted
00408 Returns:  none          
00409 **************************************************************************/
00410 void uart_puts(const char *s )
00411 {
00412     while (*s) 
00413       uart_putc(*s++);
00414 
00415 }/* uart_puts */
00416 
00417 
00418 /*************************************************************************
00419 Function: uart_puts_p()
00420 Purpose:  transmit string from program memory to UART
00421 Input:    program memory string to be transmitted
00422 Returns:  none
00423 **************************************************************************/
00424 void uart_puts_p(const char *progmem_s )
00425 {
00426     register char c;
00427     
00428     while ( (c = pgm_read_byte(progmem_s++)) ) 
00429       uart_putc(c);
00430 
00431 }/* uart_puts_p */
00432

00435  * these functions are only for ATmegas with two USART
00436  */
00437 #if defined( ATMEGA_USART1 )
00438 
00439 SIGNAL(UART1_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT)
00440 /*************************************************************************
00441 Function: UART1 Receive Complete interrupt
00442 Purpose:  called when the UART1 has received a character
00443 **************************************************************************/
00444 {
00445     unsigned char tmphead;
00446     unsigned char data;
00447     unsigned char usr;
00448     unsigned char lastRxError;
00449  
00450  
00451     /* read UART status register and UART data register */ 
00452     usr  = UART1_STATUS;
00453     data = UART1_DATA;
00454     
00455     /* */
00456     lastRxError = (usr & (_BV(FE1)|_BV(DOR1)) );
00457         
00458     /* calculate buffer index */ 
00459     tmphead = ( UART1_RxHead + 1) & UART_RX_BUFFER_MASK;
00460     
00461     if ( tmphead == UART1_RxTail ) {
00462         /* error: receive buffer overflow */
00463         lastRxError = UART_BUFFER_OVERFLOW >> 8;
00464     }else{
00465         /* store new index */
00466         UART1_RxHead = tmphead;
00467         /* store received data in buffer */
00468         UART1_RxBuf[tmphead] = data;
00469     }
00470     UART1_LastRxError = lastRxError;   
00471 }

00474 SIGNAL(UART1_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT)
00475 /*************************************************************************
00476 Function: UART1 Data Register Empty interrupt
00477 Purpose:  called when the UART1 is ready to transmit the next byte
00478 **************************************************************************/
00479 {
00480     unsigned char tmptail;
00481 
00482     
00483     if ( UART1_TxHead != UART1_TxTail) {
00484         /* calculate and store new buffer index */
00485         tmptail = (UART1_TxTail + 1) & UART_TX_BUFFER_MASK;
00486         UART1_TxTail = tmptail;
00487         /* get one byte from buffer and write it to UART */
00488         UART1_DATA = UART1_TxBuf[tmptail];  /* start transmission */
00489     }else{
00490         /* tx buffer empty, disable UDRE interrupt */
00491         UART1_CONTROL &= ~_BV(UART1_UDRIE);
00492     }
00493 }

00496 /*************************************************************************
00497 Function: uart1_init()
00498 Purpose:  initialize UART1 and set baudrate
00499 Input:    baudrate using macro UART_BAUD_SELECT()
00500 Returns:  none
00501 **************************************************************************/
00502 void uart1_init(unsigned int baudrate)
00503 {
00504     UART1_TxHead = 0;
00505     UART1_TxTail = 0;
00506     UART1_RxHead = 0;
00507     UART1_RxTail = 0;
00508     
00509 
00510     /* Set baud rate */
00511     if ( baudrate & 0x8000 ) 
00512     {
00513         UART1_STATUS = (1<<U2X1);  //Enable 2x speed 
00514       baudrate &= ~0x8000;
00515     }
00516     UBRR1H = (unsigned char)(baudrate>>8);
00517     UBRR1L = (unsigned char) baudrate;
00518 
00519     /* Enable USART receiver and transmitter and receive complete interrupt */
00520     UART1_CONTROL = _BV(RXCIE1)|(1<<RXEN1)|(1<<TXEN1);
00521     
00522     /* Set frame format: asynchronous, 8data, no parity, 1stop bit */   
00523     #ifdef URSEL1
00524     UCSR1C = (1<<URSEL1)|(3<<UCSZ10);
00525     #else
00526     UCSR1C = (3<<UCSZ10);
00527     #endif 
00528 }/* uart_init */
00529 
00530 
00531 /*************************************************************************
00532 Function: uart1_getc()
00533 Purpose:  return byte from ringbuffer  
00534 Returns:  lower byte:  received byte from ringbuffer
00535           higher byte: last receive error
00536 **************************************************************************/
00537 unsigned int uart1_getc(void)
00538 {    
00539     unsigned char tmptail;
00540     unsigned char data;
00541 
00542 
00543     if ( UART1_RxHead == UART1_RxTail ) {
00544         return UART_NO_DATA;   /* no data available */
00545     }
00546     
00547     /* calculate /store buffer index */
00548     tmptail = (UART1_RxTail + 1) & UART_RX_BUFFER_MASK;
00549     UART1_RxTail = tmptail; 
00550     
00551     /* get data from receive buffer */
00552     data = UART1_RxBuf[tmptail];
00553     
00554     return (UART1_LastRxError << 8) + data;
00555 
00556 }/* uart1_getc */

00565 void uart1_putc(unsigned char data)
